participant_1.name: Megan
participant_1.personality: Energetic and health-conscious, always looking for new ways to stay active.
participant_1.background: two dogs live with me. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. eating is something i do when i'm bored. i have short hair. i go to the gym regularly.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Disciplined and practical, with a taste for adventure and cultural cuisine.
participant_2.background: i'm in the army. i didn't graduate high school. my favourite food is shawarma. i live in canada.

content.text: hello how are you doing today? i'm great.
